text: just finished some planning for my board, and thought this might be an interesting rabbit hole: <http://www.racialequityresourceguide.org/guides/guides-and-workshops>

attachments.title: Racial Equity Resource Guide: Guides & Workshops
attachments.text: These guides and workshops can provide structure for having a dialogue on racial issues, activities focused on helping achieve racial equality, and trainings designed to raise awareness and inspire action. Using the filters below, you can view the guides and workshops based on areas of focus, related issues, and/or types.
attachments.fallback: Racial Equity Resource Guide: Racial Equity Resource Guide: Guides & Workshops
